text: Novaya Adygea (, , Pėtkėu) is a rural locality (a settlement) in Starobzhegokayskoye Rural Settlement of Takhtamukaysky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 3816 as of 2018. There are 43 streets. == References == Category:Rural localities in Takhtamukaysky District
title: Novaya Adygea
